input.sentences: there are lots of place to go to in the city .
parks are a nice place for clubs to get together .

output.sentences: It took them forever to get to the park across the town.
All the children wore scarves around their neck.
On their way to the park they saw some sculptures.
The leader of the children wore a different color scarf on his neck.
